name: cryptoads
desc: The CryptoAds platform will be based on existing project CFC.io, which was founded in 2012 and have 7M+ users with 100+ contracts with existing advertisement networks. Our goal to create a full decentralized platform and be a top developerâ€™s community worldwide.
